ComicInfo.Title: CUT; Ancient Egypt; How I Rebuilt My Punk Lawn; Summer Jobs; Lifer (The Intimate Inmate Magazine); (Try This) Cracked 5-Day Diet; Who'd She Expect…Elvis?; French Forlorn Legion; It Shouldn't Happen to a Dog; The Hollywoodization of Sopheeya Luring; Are you a shnook?
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ad parody.
Gag cartoons.
Humorous story.
Humorous story.
Parody of Life Magazine, includes a ½ page ad parody ("Betty Crocked").
Satirical story about a man going on a diet.
Wordless gag strip.
Army/war satire set in the Middle East, with racist imagery.
Joke.
Parody of "Sopheeya Luring" being Americanized.
